snippet: To enhance the profile of French literary culture, the cultural wing of the French Embassy in New York has been signing up independent bookstores across the country to create “French Corners,” special sections to display French works in the...
abstract: To enhance the profile of French literary culture, the cultural wing of the French Embassy in New York has been signing up independent bookstores across the country to create “French Corners,” special sections to display French works in the original and in translation.

headline.main: A Bookstore Corner That Is Forever France

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Politics and Prose (Washington, DC, Retail Store)
